Subsection.title: Introduction
Subsection.Paragraph: The laurel application attempts to provide tools to assist with image captioning within the context of machine learning.

In particular, the application is geared towards the management of smaller datasets (in the range of thousands of images) for use in techniques such as
LORA
training.
